mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM tl_mall_promotion.sms_home_brand hb LEFT JOIN tl_mall_goods.pms_brand b ON hb.brand_id = b.id WHERE hb.recommend_status = 1 AND b.show_status = 1 ORDER BY hb.sort DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
